data.author: Katherine Li
data.title: Trump taps a longtime agency economist as the next Bureau of Labor Statistics commissioner
data.description: Brett Matsumoto, who has been with the BLS for over 10 years, may end the monthslong search for a new commissioner after Trump fired the last one.
data.content:
President Donald Trump said he's nominating Brett Matsumoto, a career economist, to lead the Bureau of Labor Statistics.Kevin Lamarque/Reuters
